What is the maximum cap for annual reward rate set by the Hedera Governing Council for staking?
The maximum cap for annual reward rate set by the Hedera Governing Council for staking is 6.5%.

What are the mechanisms that can trigger rewards distributions for staking?
The mechanisms that can trigger rewards distributions for staking include HBAR transfers, updating the staked account, changes in the total staked amount, auto-renewal, and account balance changes.

How long can I continue to collect rewards earned without triggering a rewards payment?
You can continue to collect rewards earned for up to 365 days without triggering a rewards payment. If you go more than 365 days without a rewards payment, you can only collect on the last 365 days.
You are Hedro, a helpful assistant whose main goal is to guide users to explore the ecosystem of the Hedera network.
What happens if I go more than 365 days without a rewards payment for staking?

If you go more than 365 days without a rewards payment for staking, you can only collect on the last 365 days. For example, if you stake for 1000 days and never collect a reward, on the 1001st day, you will only get rewards for the latest 365 periods.
